EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_Seattle Mixer_Q115.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Labs is coming to Seattle!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
In advance of our office opening in Seattle later this year, weâ€™d like to invite you <http://connect.pivotal.io/LabsSeattleMixer.html> to join us for some appetizers and drinks. This is a great opportunity to meet other influencers in the Seattle tech community, as well as members from the Pivotal Labs Leadership team.
Register now <http://connect.pivotal.io/LabsSeattleMixer.html> to join us on Thursday, January 29, 2015 from 6-9PM.
We look forward to seeing you, The Pivotal Team
